name: Medal of Honor: Underground
overview: SURRENDER? COLLABORATE?...OR RESIST? YOUR country has been invaded. Your leaders have surrendered and some are now collaborating with the enemy. Join the resistance and battle the Reich from Paris to North Africa. The Fight against tyranny is in your hands. • IN-DEPTH MISSIONS: Undertake 7 missions spanning 24 levels throughout Europe • MORE FIRE POWER: 12 authentic weapons, including the devastating Panzerfaust • TEAM UP: Fellow agents fight with you, drive you to safety, and crack safes • MORE VICIOUS ENEMIES: Enemies fight with tanks, half-tracks and motorcycles • NEW DISGUISE MODE: Go undercover and gain access to the Reich's most hideous secrets
